content.rendered:
Directed by Pan Nalin.

Written by Pan Nalin. Subhadra Mahajan. Dilip Shankar. Arsala Qureishi.

Cast Amy Maghera(Joanna Mendes ‘Jo’ (as Amrit Maghera)). Rajshri Deshpande(Laxmi Gaude). Pavleen Gujral(Pamela Jaiswal ‘Pammi’). Anushka Manchanda(Madhurita Kumar ‘Mad’). Sandhya Mridul(Suranjana Sharma ‘Su’). Sarah Jane Dias(Frieda D’silva (as Sarah-Jane Dias)). Tannishtha Chatterjee(Nargis Nasreen). Nia Dhime(Maya). Yeshomati Phadte(Grandmother). Arjun Mathur(Zain, the boyfriend). Anuj Choudhry(The Neighbour (as Anuj Choudhary)). Adil Hussain(The Cop). Swapnil Salkar(Doctor (as Dr. Swapnil Salkar)). Rajesh Karekar(Tony). Anirudh Kakule(Man in washroom). Mangaldas Govekar(Police Inspector 1). 

Language Hindi.

Producers Siddharth Bagai. Sol Bondy. Shyam Bora. Gaurav Dhingra. Sudhir Chander Dhingra. Nandish Domlur. Pan Nalin. Raman Prasher. Arsala Qureishi. Gaurav Sehgal. Sumeeta Bhardwaj Sehgal. Dilip Shankar. Jamila Wenske.

Production Jungle Book Entertainment. ONE TWO Films. Protein Entertainment.
